Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are concerned about skyrocketing electricity bills in Western Australia with over 20000 households facing disconnects due to unpaid bills. The State Opposition has called for a moratorium on the disconnections to alleviate the pressure on households. The government is also cracking down on "wage theft" and non-payment of superannuation taking legal action against employers engaged in such practices. On the flip side the government has announced plans to add 130 new locally-built buses to the transport network while raising taxes on gas companies to protect Australian consumers from rising gas prices.
